title: Patient Safety Enhancement through cGMP Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen practical competencies in quality management systems within the pharmaceutical field, enhancing learning immersion through blended instructional methods (signaling, multimedia utilization, etc.)

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five core principles of cGMP (Current Good Manufacturing Practice).
Learners can identify at least three cases of quality deviations in manufacturing processes and propose solutions.
Learners can evaluate three risk factors at the work site using a digital checklist.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
